summary: Implements a semi‑supervised graph neural network based on the InfoGraph architecture. It accepts node feature matrices of size in_dim, projects them into a hidden space of size hid_dim, and computes graph‑level embeddings through a forward pass. An additional unsupervised forward method produces representations used for contrastive or self‑supervised objectives.
business_intent: Provide a reusable component for learning high‑quality node or graph embeddings from partially labeled graph data, supporting downstream analytics such as classification, recommendation, or anomaly detection in domains where labeling is scarce.
